snippet: Through a national wealth fund, the French government is buying strategic stakes in French companies, supporting their development — and, in some cases, trying to keep them out of foreign hands.
abstract: Through a national wealth fund, the French government is buying strategic stakes in French companies, supporting their development — and, in some cases, trying to keep them out of foreign hands.

headline.main: To Keep Start-Ups at Home, France Invests in Them
headline.print_headline: To Keep Its Start-Ups at Home, France Invests in Them
